nodes.text: The Dassal system was a star system located in Sector Epsilon 51-3 of the Unknown Regions of the galaxy. The system contained several planets and planetoids, including one planet, Najra-Va, which had an inhabited moon. Upon investigating First Order activity in the system, Kazuda Xiono and Poe Dameron learned that the sun of the star system had disappeared and its planets had been cored out.
